1.title: Middle Full stack developer (Python/Django, JS/Angular)

2.title: Full-stack JavaScript Developer

3.title: Full-Stack (.NET) Developer
3.job_description:
[
We’re looking for a talented Full Stack Developer to join the family and work with a client based out of Stockholm, Sweden. This is a great opportunity to join a well-structured international team, develop a unique system that simplifies data transactions, as well as customers integrations. Moreover, you will use all the modern technologies. So, our client is a startup company that reinvents the way companies stream data between systems, customers, and partners. Your role is to be a part of the core team designing and implementing everything from databases with surveillance to the design of buttons in the UI.In our collaboration model, you will work and communicate directly with the client’s development team. That means you’ll sit in our office with a really cool group of colleagues, and be in touch with the Swedish side.Responsibilities
Participate in requirements analysis
Collaborate with internal teams to produce software design and architecture
Write clean, scalable code using .NET programming languages
Test and deploy applications and systems
Revise, update, refactor and debug code
Improve existing software
Develop documentation throughout the software development lifecycle (SDLC)
Serve as an expert on applications and provide technical support
What we’re looking for
At least 3 years of experience with C#/.NET
Knowledge of ASP.NET Core (WebAPI)
Good understanding of SOLID principles
Be familiar with OOP/OOD and DI/Ioc as well as design/architectural patterns
Good knowledge of Entity Framework (Code First)
Unit testing
Experience with Angular 2+, TypeScript and HTML5/CSS3
Understanding of Agile methodologies
Excellent troubleshooting and communication skills
Good level of English
Good knowledge of T-SQL
Experience in using version control systems like Git, Mercurial etc
Bonus 
BSc/BA in Computer Science, Engineering or a related field
Microsoft Azure experience
You love borsch!
Who are you?There is such a thing as being a true Beetroot.We value people that are eager for improvement. It means that you always try to be the most caring, professional and progressive version of yourself. Your skills and experience are important factors, but your personality, approach and improvement drive are the ones that will make a difference. We hope that you’re a «team person» with an ability to accept responsibility for your work, solve problems pragmatically, and remain a highly motivated individual overall. You’re also an outgoing, well-organized, and efficient individual with a strong ability to prioritize.Now that we’ve covered the basics, let us tell you more about us!About BeetrootWe’re a Swedish-Ukrainian IT company, building dream teams of developers and designers for companies around the globe. As an emerging company co-producing with other emerging companies, we work with the start-up seedlings, as well as the huge oak trees. In essence, we’re the cannonball for our client’s success. With over 300 team members, Beetroot is a family-we're a tightly knit bunch that love spending time together. We want to provide a cozy working environment that’s packed full of trust, equality, and steaming bowls of borsch!Oh, and we provide great perks. Which means…
Working with our minimum level of hierarchy, family-feel team in a comfortable, well-equipped office
Great networking opportunities with international clients
Personal development and professional growth opportunities
Competitive salary, paid vacation, medical top-up, and social benefits
Team building activities like ski trips, Beetroot breakfasts, movie nights… and more!
English lessons with native speakers
Discounted Beetroot Academy courses
Annual allowance to participate in competence-enhancing events
What are you waiting for? Shoot us over your CV in English
]

6.title: Full Stack Developer (Middle)
6.job_description:
[
Кто мыWBC IT consulting продуктовая IT компания, которая занимается созданием и продвижением контента на западные рынки. Компания полного цикла — покрываем весь процесс от написания контента и работы с клиентами, до разработки, управления и маркетинга. Осуществляем стартап-проекты с 2009 года. Работа в нашей компании означает- всегда интересные задачи, новые проеткыт и получения ценного опыта.Какие твои задачи
разрабатывать проекты с первой строчки кода (начиная с back-end, покрывая front-end и завершая deployment to production);
приводить в порядок существующие проекты;
решать задачи бизнеса с помощью высококачественного кода и безопасных решений;
принимать участие в построении архитектуры.
Готовность соблюдать сроки и стандарты качества
Умение понимать требования к продукту
Командный игрок 
Требования Middle
5+ years of software development experience
Experience in cloud environment such as AWS
API-driven Single Page Apps
HTML, CSS, Sass, Bootstrap, etc.
MySQL, PHP, JavaScript
GitHub / Source control
Strong background in Unit Testing frameworks
OO Design and design patterns
Experience with Phalcon framework
Что тебе еще важно знать:
Образование — важная часть рабочего процесса и культуры нашей компании;
Мы ориентированы на результат — у каждого сотрудника есть KPI;
Мы даем возможность реализовать себя и свои идеи;
Оплачиваемый отпуск и больничные, возможность работы из дома и day-off;
График работы гибкий: мы приходим в интервале с 9 до 11 утра;
Наш офис находится в 5-и минутах от метро Золотые Ворота
Мы очень любим и ценним наших сотрудников — бонусы за хорошую работу наше все! 
Наша команда состоит только из лучших специалистов своего дела
У наших сотрудников есть возможность работать в динамичном окружении, где все стоящие идеи и креативность вознаграждаются и приветствуються 
Высылай CV с примером своих работ и кратким описанием проектов, в которых ты активно участвовал и развивался.[відгукнутися] Ждем тебя!
]

7.title: Full stack web developer

8.title: Full Stack Developer
8.job_description:
[
Компанія Snovio — це SaaS, що активно розвивається та який являє собою платформу для сейлз та маркетингових команд. Наші клієнти — це переважно мешканці США та країн Європи, їх кількість постійно зростає та вже сягла 250 тисяч.Зараз ми у пошукахFull Stack Developer для роботи над нашим другим проектом — Fammio — рішення для бренд моніторингу у режимі реального часу.Необхідні навички:
React, Redux
restful api
HTML5, CSS3, адаптивна верстка
JavaScript (ES6,7,8)
Webpack 4
SASS, SCSS, LESS
PHP7
Laravel
Буде плюсом:
nestjs та redux-saga
досвід роботи з PHP шаблонізаторами
До основних обов’язків буде входити:
розробка нового функціоналу з використанням сучасних технологій та підтримка існуючого
самоорганізація та ефективне управління своїм часом, щоб виконувати поставлені завдання
Що ми пропонуємо:
конкурентна заробітна плата
оплачувана відпустка та лікарняні.
зручний офіс в одному з сo-working spaces у м.Львів.
гнучкий графік роботи (cвій день зможете починати в будь-який час з 8:00 до 11:00 ранку).
можливість приєднатися та стати частиною молодої та дружньої команди.
офіційне працевлаштування.
можливість для розвитку та професійного росту.
Відправляйте своє резюме та дізнайтеся більше інформації про компанію та умови роботи з нами!
]

9.title: Full Stack developer, Team Lead
9.job_description:
[
Hello! We are CubeX company and We are looking for Full Stack Developer with work experience in a team. The person we are looking for is eager to improve the working process, can manage a team, ready to take responsibility and deliver great results.We consider candidates from all over UkraineRequirements:
2+ years working experience with JavaScript and/or PHP
Good knowledge of Angular (JS), React, Vue — at least 1 of them
Good knowledge of NodeJS and/or PHP frameworks
— NodeJS: Express, Koa, Meteor, Sails— PHP: Laravel, CodeIgniterAt least 1 of them in perfection
Excellent understanding of OOP and design patterns
Experience working with SQL, NoSQL databases
Code review experience
Experience in team management
Experience with cloud API integrations (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud Platform, Payment Gateways, etc.)
Responsible approach to the fulfillment of the tasks
High level of self-organization, solid communication skills, ability to work in a team, ability to develop and help a team
You will need:
Purely write the code
Ensure fast and stable operation of interfaces
Interact with API and back-end
Management and support junior developers 
Develop, support projects, learn new technologies and work in a team
We offer:
A worthy motivational part
Schedule: Mon-Fri. from 9:00 to 18:00
Official employment with social package
Work on interesting projects in a team of professionals
Opportunity for professional growth and career development
A lot of interesting working days with friendly team and management
Convenient office location
Delicious coffee, tea and cookies
Salary is being calculated according to the results of interviewWe are waiting for your portfolio: [відгукнутися]We will be glad to see you in our team!For all questions, please contact:
Показати телефон
Показати телефонhttps://qbex.io/
]

14.title: Full stack developer
14.job_description:
[
Beetroot is happy to announce we are looking for a new team member. We need a brilliant Full-Stack Developer to join us in supporting our growing client in Oslo, Norway.We are looking for an experienced Full Stack Developer with high quality and ethical standards to jump in and be a part of our engineering team. You will work with our high-performing team to build and maintain the digital examination platform that is used by millions of examinees and test candidates every year. Specifically, your role will be to drive the development of the core product. Along with other developers, UX designers, and data scientists, you will build delightful end-user experiences that re-invent educational assessments for the 21st century. In our collaboration model, you will work and communicate directly with the development team on the client side.Responsibilities:
Develop solid and maintainable back-end code using Java and other services: Elasticsearch, DynamoDB, Oracle DB, AWS S3, SQS, etc. 
Write concrete and maintainable front-end code using React or similar frameworks 
Automate tests using tools like Selenium, Junit or Jasmine 
Rapidly solve problems and x bugs 
Collaborate with business analysts to translate business requirements into technical requirements 
Participate in on-call rotation, Promote knowledge sharing, and DevOps culture across our entire engineering department 
What we are looking for:
An eye for clean, testable, maintainable, and well-functioning code. 
Ideally, experienced in working on large projects with many other developers 
Background in the latest frontend technologies (e.g. ECMAScript 2018, TypeScript, Webpack, etc.) 
In-depth knowledge of at least one JavaScript framework (e.g. React, Vue, or Angular) 
Strong Java (or similar) skills 
Experience with test automation — Selenium, Junit, Jasmine or comparable tools 
Strong understanding of web standards, cross-browser compatibility, and CSS-based design 
Production experience with continuous integration 
Experience with cloud platforms, preferably AWS, Oracle RDS, NoSQL databases and caching layers
Experience working with REST APIs Familiarity; performance and security best practices
Passion, drive, energy, a sense of humor and a great attitude! 
Bonus:
Experience with Agile development methodology & Test Driven development
Naming five or more dishes that include beetroot, besides borsch.
Does this describe you?There is such a thing as being a «true Beetroot».We value people who are eager for continual improvement. Someone who desires to be the most caring, professional, and progressive version of yourself. Your skills and experience are important factors, but your personality, approach, and drive for improvement are what truly make a difference. Our hope is that you will be a team player who can accept responsibility for your work, solve problems pragmatically, and remain highly motivated. It is also important to be outgoing, well-organized, and efficient with a strong ability to prioritize.Now that we’ve covered the basics, let’s share more about us!About BeetrootWe are a Swedish-Ukrainian IT company, building dream teams of developers and designers for companies around the globe. As an emerging company, co-producing with other emerging companies, we work with both start-up businesses and advanced businesses. In essence, we are the cannonball for our client’s success. With over 400 team members, Beetroot fosters a family environment. We are a tightly knit group who loves spending time together. Our desire is to provide a cozy workplace full of trust, equality, and steamy bowls of borsch!Do you like perks? So do we! We provide:
A work environment with a minimum level of hierarchy
Family-like culture in a comfortable, well-equipped office
Great networking opportunities with international clients
Personal and professional development opportunities
Competitive salary, paid vacation, medical insurance, and social benefits
Team building activities: ski trips, Beetroot breakfast, movie nights…and more!
English lessons with native speakers
Discounted Beetroot Academy courses
Annual allowance to participate in competence-enhancing events
Are you a good fit? Send us your CV in English. We are waiting to hear from you! 
]
